description:
Ride out basecamp storms in this stout, yet lightweight 4-season tent. It's a beefed up version of a typical Big Agnes tent, so it's shockingly light and packable for something that has steep walls and liveable interior space. A sturdy DAC pole system, plus 2 doors and 2 vestibules provide easy tent life and plenty of gear storage. Awesome, take it anywhere.

  • Fly is Dominico® ripstop polyester with a higher tear strength than conventional ripstop. A silicone treatment and a 1200mm polyurethane coating keep it waterproof
  • Floor is nylon taffeta with a super-durable 10,000mm polyurethane waterproof coating
  • Body is lightweight patterned ripstop nylon with polyester mesh that breathes well
  • Taped seams plus storm flaps on the vestibule zippers keep water out
  • Large diameter DAC Featherlite NSL pole system stands up to high winds and snow-loading
  • 4-way high-volume hubbed design creates lots of interior volume for waiting out storms
  • Double doors and vestibules give an entrance and gear storage to both people. Quick Stash door keepers stow them out of the way when unzipped
  • Ceiling and doors have closeable mesh panels for venting, ceiling panel doubles as a pocket
  • Fly vent and 2-way vestibule zippers create a cross-breeze to reduce condensation
  • 10 mesh pockets include media pockets above the sleeping area with cord loops
  • Oversized, reinforced stake out loops let you use skis or ice tools as stakes in the snow. Includes 10 burly DAC aluminum J stakes
  • Pre-attached dual, equalized Dyneema guy lines and tensions add strength and stability in high winds
  • Reflective guylines and webbing on tent corners improves visibility
  • Interior guy loops lets you really brace for extremely windy conditions
  • Easy grip zipper pulls, toggles and buckles can be used with gloves on
  • Interior loops let you attach a gear loft (sold separately). Compatible with the Big Agnes Triangle, Trapezoid, Large Trapezoid, Wall and Large Wall Gear Lofts.
  • Fast fly configuration lets you pitch the fly and footprint alone for a shelter that weights only 1.39kg. (Footprint sold separately.)
name: Big Agnes Copper Spur HV2 Expedition
